document.heading: Retired Police Annuity Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-321, the “Retired Police Annuity Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-743 which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2008, and December 2, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 22, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-625 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-321 became effective on March 21, 2009.
